sentences.english: Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .
sentences.chinese: 有關伊拉克叛亂分子發射防空導彈的錄像。

sentences.english: We were overjoyed at the news of China haying launched another man-made satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我們聽到中國又發射了一顆人造衛星時都很高興。

sentences.english: Intermodulation distortion is an important factor affecting the property of television transmitter.
sentences.chinese: 互調失真是影響電視發射機性能的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: Have you ever witnessed a missile launch?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾目睹過導彈發射？

sentences.english: The concepts of radiant emittance and of irradiance are complementary.
sentences.chinese: 輻射的發射強度和輻照度是兩個互補的概念。

sentences.english: But the cosmodrome is just a start for Russia's new space ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 但航天器發射場只是俄羅斯新的空間雄心的開始。

sentences.english: China can also launch the improved version of the "Sunburn."
sentences.chinese: 也可以發射中國改進版的“日炙”。

sentences.english: The heating would be done from a transmitter outside the body.
sentences.chinese: 加熱是由體外發射機來進行的。

sentences.english: Forward firing is discussed in this article only.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中主要研究了越肩發射的前射方式。
這也就是稱爲場至發射顯微鏡的技術。

sentences.english: These kinds of jinn can be killed with date or plum stones fired from a sling.
sentences.chinese: 可以用彈弓發射棗核或者李子核射殺這幾種精靈。

sentences.english: A new method of measuring target wideband emissivity is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種新的測量發射率的方法。

sentences.english: STM is a low coast A. S. K. SAW transmitter module.
sentences.chinese: 掃描隧道顯微鏡是一種低海岸調幅聲發射模塊。

sentences.english: Many countries have set up man-made satellites to circle the earth.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家已發射了人造衛星環繞地球。

sentences.english: The launch marks a milestone for the country's space program.
sentences.chinese: 這次發射標誌著印度航空計劃的一個新的里程碑。

sentences.english: The launch window remains open for one hour and 43 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 發射窗口有一小時43分鐘。

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
